title: Ratha and Thistle-Chaser
description: Crippled and tortured by paralyzing nightmares, Newt, a solitary cat, finds a new life for herself with the strange tusked creatures of the seashore until her peaceful existence is disrupted by Ratha's scout, Thakur, who brings welcome companionship but also forces Newt to face her terrifying past. Reprint.
author: Clare Bell
